name: Sweet Potato (Kumara) Wedges
author: Nikki Harris
summary: This is a recipe I made while attempting to finish a food tech assignment. This also works well with regular potatoes. Sweet potatoes are known as 'kumara' in New Zealand where I am from. Serve with sour cream.
ingredients: 4 large sweet potatoes, cut into wedges
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Drizzle a medium baking sheet with the vegetable oil
In a large, resealable plastic bag, mix flour, paprika, mustard powder, salt, and pepper
Place sweet potato wedges in the bag, and toss to coat
Arrange coated sweet potato wedges on the prepared baking sheet
Bake 20 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until browned and crisp
